Once again at the beIN e-LIGUE 1 show on beIN SPORTS, Bruce Grannec and Mahmoud Gassama, alias Bruce & Brak, answered our questions about the new FIFA 20 opus. Interview with the reference duo of e- sport in France.
06 Nov 2019, 16:01 by Thomas Rassouli




What is your opinion on this new FIFA opus?

Bruce: I like it a lot! Last year FIFA 19 was a little too arcade for my taste, it was a little too open, too focused on the attack. I prefer when it's more relaxed, as on FIFA 20. The defense is less assisted, and you really have to build more.
Brak: It challenges the players a bit because you have to learn to defend again. We must build a lot, think. The idea is good to make the game a little harder.


What did you like the most?

Brak: The fact that you really have to learn to defend again. On FIFA 18 and FIFA 19, the defense was much more assisted. This is revolutionary.
Bruce: The tempo of the matches. If you go too far forward it's more complicated. It really looks more like a football match.


Conversely, what are you waiting for in terms of improvements?

Brak: What we are really waiting for is a new gameplay engine and a new graphics engine, but that will only happen with the new consoles. There we a little exhausted the thing. This is what is expected most now, a new generation.
Bruce: In terms of content, we are served, so Brak had a good idea (laughs).


We talk a lot about the Volta mode, what is your opinion?

Brak: It's a great idea to have put it back in FIFA, because it's clearly FIFA Street. It is deadly when you play several, but solo we quickly go around.
Bruce: It's funny with friends, and that's where it's a shame. We dream to see appear on Volta a kind of pro club. It may happen, I think it's just an introduction.




"Rongier is currently the best FIFA player in Ligue 1"




Valentin Rongier + 1 ğŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport


For you, which team is much too cheatÃ©e this year?

Brak: I would say Liverpool. It's very, very strong this year. And watch out for the Equipe de France, it's an armada!
Bruce: Liverpool of course, the PSG with Neymar-MbappÃ© who remains very strong, and after I do not forget the BarÃ§a, because Messi is incredible this year in the game. And then I do not bury the Real Madrid which keeps a iron defense.


And which player is the most cheat?

Bruce: Messi he is not really cheated because he deserves in real life. After you keep cheats like Ben Yedder, extremely strong this season.
Brak: Zaha and Lucas, impressive this year!


Can you give us your good plan FUT?

Bruce: Buy cheap players, like Ben Yedder, Sissoko, Ferland Mendy who is also monstrous ... You have to try to build, to be able to face players who have maybe a better team than you but who are less good than you in hand. We must identify these little players quickly!
Brak: On FUT there are a lot of little techniques allowing you to make credits. And this year, there is apparently a tech jersey that allows you to make you every weekend an incredible amount of credit. In addition, there are three really important stats this year for players making the difference, agility, passes and finishing.


Between you two, Bruce has a lead in the number of confrontations. Will this year be reversed?

Brak: (laughs) You did not even believe it yourself by asking the question. Honestly, it's weird but I feel that lately the games are a little tighter. So he always wins, but we play a lot less than before where we guessed easily, so there is a little surprise effect.
Bruce: It may be true, the less play, I'm not used to his style of play.


You've had the opportunity to play FIFA against Ligue 1 players. Who's the hottest?

Brak: Rodier is currently I think the best FIFA player in Ligue 1. After we played a lot of others. Bruce had played against Romain DanzÃ© at the time, it was pretty incredible. There is also Thomas TourÃ© who has a pretty phenomenal level, I was impressed when I saw him play.
Bruce: Very very strong DanzÃ©. There was Benzema too, I played it a while ago but I did 3-4 games, I found it good.
